---
title: "replay"
description: "Downloads the replay for the specified agent in webp format"
---



```python
replay = agent.replay()
```

The replay is a webp file that can be displayed in a browser.

```python
replay.show()
```



## Parameters

<ParamField path="agent_id" type="str" required>
  The identifier of the agent to download the replay for.
</ParamField>

## Returns

[`MP4Replay`](/sdk-reference/misc/mp4replay): The replay file in webp format.
